title: The Challenge
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Frank Killian and Ampol Petroleum Ltd
brief_description: This is a tribute to the Australians who sailed Gretel” in the America’s Cup…” Traces the construction of the Australian challenger, “Gretel”, its trials in America, and finally its efforts in the America’s Cup yacht races.
